sam-intro: This is where I showcase all my original characters and share their story.
Before you look around, I'll give you a few trigger warnings.
My art, characters and story can include elements such as: gore, body horror, NSFW, self harm, suicide, child abuse, nonsexual nudity, sexual violence, medical themes and trypophobia.
Phew, that was a lot! Feel free to explore and learn more about them!
